original_text: and when they did not find his body, they came back saying that they had even seen a vision of angels, who said that he was alive.
korean_text: 그의 시체는 보지 못하고 와서 그가 살아나셨다 하는 천사들의 나타남을 보았다 함이라

sentences.original_text: and when they did not find his body
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그의 시신을 찾지 못했을 때

sentences.original_text: that they had even seen a vision of angels
who said that he was alive
